command.label: Base Command
command.tooltip: Main command to generate an encounter for the user.

start.label: Start Command
start.tooltip: When the user generates an Encounter (!cipher) or a random Encounter has occured for the user, this command will start the mini-game.

help.label: Help Option
help.tooltip:
Optional Argument for the Base command (!cipher), displays the help response message 'helpMessage'.

Usage: !cipher help

enable.label: Enable Option
enable.tooltip:
Optional Argument for the Base command (!cipher), allows the user to exclude themself from random Encounters, if random Encounters are enabled.

Usage: !cipher enable

disable.label: Disable Option
disable.tooltip:
Optional Argument for the Base command (!cipher), allows the user to include themself for random Encounters (Enabled for every user by default), if random Encounters are enabled.

Usage: !cipher disable

stats.label: Statistics Option
stats.tooltip:
Optional Argument for the Base command (!cipher), displays user specific statistics.

Usage: !cipher stats

ranks.label: Leaderboard Option
ranks.tooltip:
Optional Argument for the Base command (!cipher), displays top users.

Usage: !cipher top

blacklist.label: Exclude Username
blacklist.tooltip:
Allows you to exclude usernames from generating random encouters, will not exclude user if s/he changed their name. Usernames should be separated by '|'.

Example:
HypeBot|VeCious|SomeoneWorseThanVe|PythonIsAwesome

cost.label: Command Cost
cost.tooltip: Amount of currency user needs to pay to use the base command (!cipher).

costFail.label: Failure Cost
costFail.tooltip: Amount of currency user will lose when failing to solve the cipher, this amount will be to the cost for the command.

cooldownRandom.label: Random Encounter Cooldown
cooldownRandom.tooltip: Cooldown for random encounters (if enabled), cooldown is in Minutes.

cooldownUser.label: User Cooldown
cooldownUser.tooltip: User specific cooldown, applied if Global Cooldown is not enabled, cooldown is in Minutes.

cooldownGlobal.label: Global Cooldown
cooldownGlobal.tooltip: Global cooldown, overwrites user specific cooldown, set to 0 to disable, cooldown is in Minutes.

codeLength.label: Code Length
codeLength.tooltip:
How long the code sequence should be.
Recommended: 4-8

codeLengthHard.label: Code Length (Hard Mode)
codeLengthHard.tooltip:
How long the code sequence should be on hard mode.
Recommended: 9-12

codeLengthScramble.label: Scramble string Length
codeLengthScramble.tooltip:
How long the scrambled string should be.
Recommended: 16-32

** NOTE ** Keep in mind that the chat has a character limit (360).

timer.label: Time Limit
timer.tooltip: Amount time in seconds the user has to input correct code.

timerHard.label: Time Limit (Hard Mode)
timerHard.tooltip: Amount time in seconds the user has to input correct code on hard mode.

timerStart.label: Start Timer
timerStart.tooltip: Amount of time in minutes the user has to run the start command after a cipher has been generated.

reward.label: Currency Reward
reward.tooltip: Amount of currency user can win by solving a cipher.

rewardHard.label: Currency Reward (Hard Mode)
rewardHard.tooltip: Amount of currency user can win by solving a cipher, on hard mode.

random.label: Random Encounters
random.tooltip: Chance for users to trigger random encounters while chatting, set to 0 to disable. Consider how active your chat is when setting this value.

hardMode.label: Hard Mode
hardMode.tooltip: Chance for generated ciphers to be harder, set to 0 to disable.

msgEncounter.label: Encounter Response
msgEncounter.value: @$user you have generated a cipher, type [$start] to start decoding. Use [$help] to view instructions. [$time minute/s left]
msgEncounter.tooltip: Response when user generates a cipher or triggers a random encounter.

msgStart.label: Start Response
msgStart.value: @$user your cipher is [$cipher], extract the code from it. [$time seconds left]!
msgStart.tooltip: Response when user starts decoding a generated cipher.

msgCurrency.label: Not enough Currency Response
msgCurrency.value: You do not have enough $currency ($points), $cost needed!
msgCurrency.tooltip: Response when the base command is on cooldown, does not apply to options such as 'stats'.

msgCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
msgCooldown.value: The generator is cooling down, try again in [$cooldown]!
msgCooldown.tooltip: Response when the base command is on cooldown, does not apply to options such as 'stats'.

msgTimeout.label: Timeout Response
msgTimeout.value: /w cipher timed-out after $time, try again in [$cooldown].
msgTimeout.tooltip: Response when a generated cipher has timed-out.

msgSolved.label: Solved Response
msgSolved.value: Congratulations @$user! You have earned $points $currency by solving the cipher in $time seconds.
msgSolved.tooltip: Response when the user has successfully solved a cipher.

msgFailed.label: Failed Response
msgFailed.value: @$user you have failed to input the correct code ($code) in time ($time), good luck next time!
msgFailed.tooltip: Response when the user fails to type in the correct code in time, or types in the wrong code.

msgEnabled.label: Encounter Enabled Response
msgEnabled.value: /w you have enabled random cipher encounters, to disable them use [$disable]
msgEnabled.tooltip: Notify the user that s/he has enabled random encounters.

msgDisabled.label: Encounter Disabled Response
msgDisabled.value: /w you have disabled random cipher encounters, to enable them again use [$enable]
msgDisabled.tooltip: Notify the user that s/he has disabled random encounters.

msgStats.label: Stats Response
msgStats.value: /w Attempts: $attempts | Encounter: $encounter | Solved: $solved | Record: $record | Average: $average | Rate: $success

msgHelp.label: Help Response
msgHelp.value: /w $command generates a cipher, $start to start deciphering a cipher. $stats lists stats, $ranks lists top 3 crackers. $enable/$disable enables or disables random encounters. Extract the number sequence from the cipher to solve it.

update.label: Check for Updates
update.tooltip: If enabled, the script will check for newer version on Initialization.
